sections:
When to Play:

Melee items slammed

How to Play:

level 8 roll for 4 warrior + preservers

Go 9, replace lilia hecarim for Milio Morg and Zilean

Items:

Fiora: BT Steraks + 1

Gwen: BB + JG + 1 (HOJ, GUNBLADE, BT, CROWNGUARD, RABADON, GS, GUARDBREAKER)

Kat: JG HOJ

When to Play:

Hunter + Shape opener

How to Play:

Level 8 roll for 6 shapeshifter + Varus + Nomsy. Play Briar / Smolder if you hit

Go 9 for Smolder / Briar

Items:

Varus: Guinsoo IE + 1 , transfer to Smolder when you hit

Nasus/Swain/Neeko: Redemption Evenshroud

Briar: AD items

When to Play:

AD items, no guinsoo

How to Play:

Level 8 roll for above board. Play preserver before Xerath

Arcana Tahm, Hecarim if you need more damage

Items:

Varus: Redbuff + IE + 1 (double IE is best, can also use SHOJIN, LW, DB, GS, RUNAANS)

Tahm: Vow + Evenshroud + 1

When to Play:

Faerie opener / Guinsoo

How to Play:

Go level 8, play 5 faerie + hec + jax + zilean.

If you have a spat, drop Tristana for another preserver or arcana

Go 9, replace Tristana with Milio, replace Jax with Camille, play more preserver/arcana

Items:

Kalista: Guinsoo x2 (LW, RUNAANS, REDBUFF, DB, IE also work)

Rakan: Warmogs + 1 (Gargoyle, Steadfast, Adaptive, DCLAW, Bramble, etc)

Hecarim: Evenshroud

When to Play:

AP opener

How to Play:

Fast 8, roll for Karma Bard Zilean Gwen Fiora + x. Can play Taric/Diana, Morg/Rakan, Neeko/Nasus/Briar/Swain

Items:

Karma: Morello + Shiv

Fiora: AD items

Gwen: BB + AP

Nasus/Rakan: Tank

When to Play:

AP opener

How to Play:

Level 8 roll for 4 scholar + Taric + frontline. Can play bastion with Taric, Rakan, Morg.

Arcana Tahm

Items:

Ryze: Attack Speed + AP

Taric/Rakan/Tahm: Tank

When to Play:

Pyro + 1

How to Play:

Fast 8, roll for 5 pyro (if pyro spat) + arcana + rumble

Board above is ideal board.

Can play any shape before Briar and Pyro spat on Hecarim. Can also play Pyro Camille.

Items:

Varus: Shojin IE + 1

Nasus/Tahm/Shen: Tank items

When to Play:

Blaster + 1

How to Play:

Go level 8 and roll for 5 blaster + hec shen tahm. Replace Hwei with Smolder.

Cap board with Xerath.

Arcana charm on Hecarim

Items:

Varus: Shojin IE + 1 (LW, DB, IE, Shojin)

Leftover AD items on Ezreal

Tank items on Tahm

When to Play:

Chrono Emblem

How to Play:

Go level 8 play 6 chrono + x. Can be preservers, gwen + fiora, nasus+neeko, incantor, etc

Play 4 chrono + x before you hit Camille

Items:

Karma: BB Morello + 1

Rakan: Tank

When to Play:

Hunter Emblem

How to Play:

Push level 8 and roll for 6 hunter + bard zilean wukong

Same as Jinx reroll except youre tempoing 8 instead of rerolling

Roll for Jinx/Wu on 8

Items:

Jinx: Guinsoo Runaans + 1

Wukong: Gargoyle + 2

Olaf: AD items

Hunter emblem can go on Zilean or Bard

When to Play:

Scholar Emblem

How to Play:

Go level 8 and roll for 6 scholar (must hit milio)

If you dont hit milio, play 4 scholar + frontline units and go 9

Items:

Ryze: Redbuff/Morello + AP

Milio: Attack Speed / Mana gen items

Taric: Tank

When to Play:

Sugarcraft emblem or augment

How to Play:

Fast 8 and roll for 5 sugarcraft + fiora + tahm + morgana. Can play Rakan before Morgana

Sugarcraft emblem on fiora

Items:

Gwen: BB + AP + HEALING

Tahm: Tank items

Fiora: AD items

When to Play:

Witchcraft emblem or augment

How to Play:

Go level 8 play 5 witchcraft + karma/ryze + bastion/shapeshifter/scholar

Cap board with Morgana + Preservers

Items:

Karma: BB Morello + Witchcraft emblem

Ryze: Attack Speed + AP + witchcraft emblem

Fiora: AD items

Taric/Neeko/Nasus: Tank items

When to Play:

Eldrich augment or emblem

How to Play:

Fast 8, play 6 eldritch + x. Can play Gwen/Fiora or Galio+Mage or Karma

Items:

Nami: Shojin + AP

Morde/Tahm: Tank

When to Play:

Frost augment / emblem

How to Play:

Go fast 8, play 7 frost + varus + nasus. Can also play shen instead of nasus.

Replace Warwick with Diana

Items:

Varus: Shojin + AD

Nasus/Swain/Shen: Tank

Hwei: AP items

When to Play:

Portal Emblem/Augment

How to Play:

Go 8 and play 8 portal + 1. Can be Diana/Briar/Tahm/Nami/Nasus

Items:

Ryze: Redbuff + AP

Taric: Tank

When to Play:

Lots of Ashe/Jax, lots of bows / pandoras

How to Play:

Slowroll level 5 for Ashe 3 > Jax 3

Push levels for 7 multi

Can play arcana before Camille

Items:

Ashe: Guinsoo + Runaans + LW/Redbuff

Jax: Tank items

Leftover AD items on Hec/Kalista

When to Play:

Lots of Ezreal/Hwei , reroll augment

How to Play:

Go level 7, play 4 blaster 4 vanguard.

Reroll Ezreal 3 > Hwei 3 > Morde 3

Items:

Ezreal: IE LW + 1 (Redbuff, Shojin, Hoj, BT, DB, GS)

Hwei: Mana + AP

Morde: Tank

When to Play:

Guinsoo Opener + Gargoyle Wukong

How to Play:

Go level 7, roll 4 hunter + Wukong + Bard + Zilean

3 star Jinx > Wukong > push levels

Level for more preservers

Items:

Jinx: Guinsoo LW Runaans

Wukong: Gargoyle Gargoyle Redemption

Olaf: BT Steraks

When to Play:

Support augments / lots of Kassadins

How to Play:

Level 6 slowroll for Kassadin 3 -> Akali 3 -> push levels for 7 multi

Play arcana before 7 multi

Items:

Kassadin: Titans BT + 1 (Nashor, QSS, Guinsoo)

Akali/Hecarim: Leftover AD items

When to Play:

Lots of kogs, reroll augment

How to Play:

Go level 6, roll for above board minus olaf

Hit Kogmaw 3 > Nunu3 > Rumble 3 > push levels for 4 hunter

Can roll for Jinx 3, or push levels for Bastion

Items:

Kog: Shojin Redbuff LW

Jinx: Guinsoo + Runaans

Rumble/Nunu: Tank

When to Play:

Lots of Soraka / Seraphines

How to Play:

Level 5 slowroll for Soraka 3 > Seraphine 3

Push levels for vertical mage

Items:

Soraka: Shojin + AP

Seraphine: Shojin + AP

Vex: Tank

When to Play:

Early Veigar/Vex + tear/rod

How to Play:

Go level 7, play 5 mage + Morde + Zilean. Can also play Nunu+Blitz for 3 honey

Roll for Veigar 3 > Vex 3 , push levels for Yuumi

Items:

Veigar: BB Nashor Shojin or AP

Vex: Spark + Tank

When to Play:

Vampiric Scepter Ornn item

How to Play:

Level 5 roll for Warwick 3 > Blitz 3 > Twitch 3

Push levels for 6 vanguard

Items:

Warwick: Vamp Scepter + Guinsoo + Titans/QSS

Blitz: Tank

Twitch: LW

When to Play:

Lots of Ziggs/Blitz

How to Play:

Level 5, roll for Ziggs 3 > Blitz 3, push levels for Arcana

Can roll for Veigar 3 on 7 if uncontested

Items:

Ziggs: BB JG + 1

Veigar: Leftover AP items

Blitz: Tank

When to Play:

Dejavu hero augment

How to Play:

Go level 6, roll for Galio 3, push levels for 4 vanguard + x

Items:

Galio: Guinsoo x 2 + Gunblade

Morde/Rumble: Tank items

When to Play:

High Horsepower hero augment

How to Play:

Slowroll level 5 for Lilia 3 > Poppy 3 > Zoe 3

Push levels for 4 bastion 4 scholar 2 arcana

Items:

Lilia: BT AA SPARK

Poppy: Tank items

Zoe: Leftover AP items

When to Play:

Molten Caramel Rumble Hero augment

How to Play:

Go level 6, play 4 vanguard + trist + bard

Slowroll for Rumble 3 > Trist 3 > Galio 3

Push levels for preservers

Items:

Rumble: BT + AP

Trist: AD

Galio: Tank

When to Play:

Spider Queen Hero Augment

How to Play:

Roll for Elise 3 > push levels for 6 shape + varus + smolder

Play Briar if you hit

Items:

Elise: AP + HEALING + SPARK / TANK ITEMS

Varus: AD items

When to Play:

Sweet Tooth hero augment

How to Play:

Level 6 play 5 Honey + Bastion

Roll for Nunu 3 > Kog 3 > level up and can roll for Veigar 3.

Push levels for more bastions

Items:

Nunu: Warmogs BT AA/Crownguard

Veigar: AP items

Kog: AD items

When to Play:

Witchy Wallop Hero Augment

How to Play:

Level 5, slowroll for Poppy 3 > Zoe 3 > Lilia 3

Push levels for 4 Bastion + 4 Scholar + Arcana

Items:

Poppy: BT Steraks IE

Zoe: AP items

Lilia: Tank items

When to Play:

Zap Attack Hero Augment

How to Play:

Roll for Blitz 3 > Ziggs 3, push levels for 5 honey + 3 mage

Can roll for Veigar 3 if uncontested

Items:

Blitz: Warmog Spark + 1 (Crownguard, Gargoyle)

Veigar: AP items

flowChart.augment: Hunting Frenzy / Hunter Crest / Crown / Category Five

sections:
**Should you pre-level or no?**

What is “pre-leveling”? Pre-leveling is the strategy of buying XP so that you’ll hit the next level at the start of the next turn.

So at Stage 1-4, you are at level 3 0/6 exp. If you push 4 into exp, you will be at level 3 4/6 exp. You gain 2 exp per round, so the next round (at Stage 2-1), it will automatically level you up to level 4, giving you LEVEL 4 SHOP ODDS instead of LEVEL 3.

Level 4 shop odds open you up to 3 cost units and a higher chance at 2 cost units, with a lower chance at 1 cost units.

Keeping this in mind, you can decide whether or not you want to PRE-LEVEL or not.

PRE-LEVEL IF:

* You have upgraded 1 cost units
* You have clear direction on what early game you’re playing
* If you want higher odds at hitting 2/3 cost units

OTHERWISE, don’t PRE-LEVEL

PRE-LEVELING IS WRONG IN ABOUT 90% OF YOUR GAMES!

PRE-LEVELING when you shouldn’t usually leads to weak board strength and poor econ.

Level to 4 or stay level 3?

Level to 4 if you think you can win streak. Otherwise, stay level 3 and go for lose streak / carousel priority.

HOW TO KNOW IF YOU CAN WINSTREAK OR NOT: If you have a strong slammable item and/or you have multiple upgraded units, you are probably strong and can go for win streak.

Examples:

Kennen 2 Taric 2 Corki 2\. STRONG.

Annie 2 TahmKench 2 Olaf 2\. STRONG.

Nami 1 Taric 1 Gragas 1\. NOT STRONG. No upgraded units.

If you leveled at 2-1 and are currently level 4:

In most games you would stay level 4\. However, if you started with a 12+ gold opener AND won the first round, you can put in 8 EXP to level to 5 IF you have a good 5th unit to play and are contesting win streak with someone else that is pretty strong.

If you lost the first round, DO NOT level.

If you are level 3:

If you won the first round when you were trying to lose, you should level to 4 to try to win streak. HOWEVER, if you are absolutely positive you cannot beat anyone even if you level, DO NOT LEVEL, stay level 3.

If you lost but upgraded a few units from the current shop and think you can start winning / 4th unit spikes your board pretty hard, you can level to 4 here.

Otherwise, just stay level 3 and lose again.

By now, EVERYONE should be level 4 here.

If you are on a 2 win streak AND have a good 5th unit to play, and you are contesting win streak with multiple players, level to 5 here.

YOU SHOULD BE SCOUTING FOR STRONG OPPONENTS IN THE LOBBY TO POSITION FOR. Usually, these are the opponents with 100 / high HP in the lobby.

On this turn, you should generally pre-level or make 10 gold.

If you can’t make 10 gold without selling valuable units, pre-level to 5 here to get level 5 shop odds (Push in exp until level 4 8/10 exp).

Otherwise, make 10 gold.

However, if you are contesting lose streak and you think having an extra unit for the next two rounds would cause you to beat someone else contesting lose streak, DO NOT PRE-LEVEL.

YOU SHOULD BE THINKING ABOUT WHAT CAROUSEL ITEM TO GET HERE. FIRST, SECOND, THIRD, FOURTH, AND FIFTH BEST CHOICES.

If you are level 5, there’s nothing to do here. If you’re win streaking, make sure to scout for tough opponents you haven’t fought yet and position for them.

If you are still level 4 and think you can win the next 2 rounds, you can level to 5 here and go for a 2 win streak into neutrals.

HOW TO KNOW IF YOU CAN WINSTREAK NEXT TWO ROUNDS:

If you completed a strong item from carousel (e.g. Sunfire Cape if you have upgraded frontline units) AND upgraded a few units / got a strong carry, you can probably try to win the next two rounds.

KEEPING TRACK OF OPPONENTS YOU FOUGHT IS VERY USEFUL HERE. If you’ve already fought the 3 strongest people in the lobby, you can scout the remaining players left in your pool and make a judgement call as to whether you can win the next two or not.

If you are still level 4 and don’t think you can win the next 2 rounds, you stay level 4 here and keep losing.

IF YOU ARE ON A 3 OR 4 LOSS STREAK:

Make sure to scout and make your board weaker than the weakest player in the lobby you haven’t fought yet. You do NOT want to win and want to lose streak into neutrals for maximum econ.

IF YOU ARE ON A 4 WIN STREAK:

On rare occasions, if you are rich (12+ gold opener / have an econ augment like hustler), you can level to 6 if you have a good 6th unit to play AND are contesting win streak with someone else.

MAKE SURE TO SCOUT TOUGHEST OPPONENT YOU HAVENT FOUGHT YET AND POSITION FOR THEM!!!

OTHERWISE, do nothing.
